hero.name: MOHAMED EZZAT
hero.title: Business Development & E-Commerce Strategist
hero.description: Crafting innovative business models and driving growth through data-driven strategies.

about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a fourth-year E-Commerce student with a developed passion for business development, which has driven me to embark on a journey of learning and reading to become well-versed in all aspects of this field.

jobs.title: Business Consultant for startup companies
responsibilities: Detailed study of the current status of the establishment to identify strengths and weaknesses.
Designing a Business Model for Startups: Detailed Departmental Roles.
Develop customer acquisition and retention strategies.
Analyze the profitability of different revenue models.
Build and maintain the brand identity and messaging.
How to do digital marketing on social media platforms and reach the right audience to promote a product and increase sales.

jobs.title: Social Media Accounts Developer (own business)
responsibilities: Developing social media accounts from scratch to become a source of income.
Creating engaging content and managing accounts to build a strong online presence.
Increasing viewership and reaching the target audience by understanding algorithms and content suitable for the specific demographic.

education.title: Education & Certifications
education.institution: Student at The Higher Institute of E-Commerce Systems
education.description: This specialization combines accounting with electronic software that assists in business systems, specifically accounting and administrative programs that keep pace with current technological advancements in the world.

certificates.name: Diploma of Administration Manager / In Administration Management by MTF Institute
MTF Institute Executive Diploma in Business Strategy, Business Module, Strategic Management
Creative Thinking: Techniques and Tools for Success (Imperial College London)
Digital Product Management: Modern Fundamentals (University of Virginia)
Business Model Canvas: A Tool for Entrepreneurs and Innovators (Kennesaw State University)
